entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then cloudy. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
